author: Staff Reporter
title: NOC must for industries to operate during lockdown
description: The industries have to register by giving basic information and employee details and fill the check list for seeking the permission to restart operations
content: The Industries Department has announced that industries and industrial establishments that want to operate during the lockdown subject to adopting the standard operating procedures and social distancing norms have to obtain a no-objection certificate (NOC) fo… [+654 chars]
